Note: Date based on dates of 1st World War. Orientation: Vertical.
Description: Text says that Serbia's Flag Day is on Sept. 22nd, and King Marko returns to lead his people. Illustration shows a war scene with injured people and troops all turning their attention to a man arriving on a horse.
Digital Collection: Allied Posters of World War I

Title: Serbia's Flag Day
